data_table.description: Specimen Draws - details regarding specimen collections

variable.name: DRAWDY
variable.comment: Number of days from randomization/enrollment to date of specimen draw.

variable.name: DRAWVY
variable.comment: Visit year for which this specimen was collected.

variable.name: DRAWMONTH
variable.comment: Month in which specimen was drawn/collected.

variable.name: DRAWTIME
variable.comment: Time specimen was drawn in military time. Format HH24:MI (e.g. 13:20).

variable.name: CFUGTIME
variable.comment: Time that centrifuging of specimen began in military time. Format HH24:MI (e.g. 13:20). Variable specific to only the WHI Processing Protocol, see variable PROCPROT.

variable.name: VIALTIME
variable.comment: Time specimen placed into cryovials in military time. Format HH24:MI (e.g. 13:20). Variable specific to only the WHI Processing Protocol, see variable PROCPROT.

variable.name: FREZTIME
variable.comment: Time cryovials placed in freezer in military time. Format HH24:MI (e.g. 13:20).

variable.name: FASTHRS
variable.comment: Number of hours since had anything to eat or drink besides water before specimen draw.

variable.name: VIGACT
variable.comment: Engaged in vigorous physical activity in last eight hours before specimen draw. Variable specific to only the WHI Processing Protocol, see variable PROCPROT.

variable.name: ANTIINFL
variable.comment: Took aspirin or anti-inflammatory agents in last 48 hours before specimen draw. Variable specific to only the WHI Processing Protocol, see variable PROCPROT.

variable.name: LIPEMIC
variable.comment: For HT and HT + DM screening visit and annual visits. Serum is lipemic. Variable specific to only the WHI Processing Protocol, see variable PROCPROT.

variable.name: EDTA10MLLIPEMIC
variable.comment: Variable specific to only the WHI-LLS Processing Protocol, see variable PROCPROT.

variable.name: EDTA10MLHEMOLYTIC
variable.comment: Variable specific to only the WHI-LLS Processing Protocol, see variable PROCPROT.

variable.name: PSTLIPEMIC
variable.comment: Variable specific to only the WHI-LLS Processing Protocol, see variable PROCPROT.

variable.name: PSTHEMOLYTIC
variable.comment: Variable specific to only the WHI-LLS Processing Protocol, see variable PROCPROT.

variable.name: PSTSPUN
variable.comment: EDTA PST vial arrived at the specimen processing lab centrifuged by the EMSI examiner. Variable specific to only the WHI-LLS Processing Protocol, see variable PROCPROT.

variable.name: SSTLIPEMIC
variable.comment: Variable specific to only the WHI-LLS Processing Protocol, see variable PROCPROT.

variable.name: SSTHEMOLYTIC
variable.comment: Variable specific to only the WHI-LLS Processing Protocol, see variable PROCPROT.

variable.name: SSTSPUN
variable.comment: Serum SST vial arrived at the specimen processing lab centrifuged by the EMSI examiner. Variable specific to only the WHI-LLS Processing Protocol, see variable PROCPROT.

variable.name: SSTRESPUN
variable.comment: Flag indicating whether the WHI-LLS serum separator tube (SST) was centrifuged a second time, in error, by the specimen processing lab. Variable specific to only the WHI-LLS Processing Protocol, see variable PROCPROT.

variable.name: PKGRCVDY
variable.comment: Number of days from randomization/enrollment to date of WHI-LLS specimen package received at WHI specimen processing lab. Variable specific to only the WHI-LLS Processing Protocol, see variable PROCPROT.

variable.name: PKGRCVTM
variable.comment: Time specimen packaging was received at specimen processing lab. Format HH24:MI (e.g. 13:20). Variable specific to only the WHI-LLS Processing Protocol, see variable PROCPROT.

variable.name: PKGASSESS
variable.comment: Variable specific to only the WHI-LLS Processing Protocol, see variable PROCPROT.

variable.name: REFRTIME
variable.comment: Time EDTA 10ml and 2ml vials were placed in refrigerated transport kit by the EMSI examiner. Format HH24:MI (e.g. 13:20). Variable specific to only the WHI-LLS Processing Protocol, see variable PROCPROT.

variable.name: SHPPKCMPDY
variable.description: Ship package complete days since randomization
variable.comment: Number of days from randomization/enrollment to date of WHI-LLS specimen package completion date. Variable specific to only the WHI-LLS Processing Protocol, see variable PROCPROT.

variable.name: SHPPKCMPTM
variable.comment: Time EMSI examiner completed packaging vials for shipment. Format HH24:MI (e.g. 13:20). Variable specific to only the WHI-LLS Processing Protocol, see variable PROCPROT.

variable.name: PROCPROT
variable.comment: The study that performed the specimen draw. See the Data Prep document for information on specimen processing for each protocol.
